name: Princess Luna FimFiction 3.0 Style Theme
description: A theme similar to the original luna theme, keeps sparkling stars but uses different assets & colors. (to animate you must use the "dark" theme as your preset.)
additional_info: - Latest Update: 20th April, 2018 - v1.2 - Cleaned-up top bar & added larger Remove-Ad button for your convenience How to 1) install it 2) select dark theme in the reading window 3) read and enjoy --- I'm also known as "CookieGalaxy" if you wanna nag me. --- Discord: CookieGalaxy#7675 Old Patch Notes v1.0 - Released [and very not tested] v1.1 - Made it use less resources on chrome, probably broke it somewhere else v1.1.1 - [Double Opacity Version Added] Little Tweaks, also made it so you can actually see the format button... hehe

discussions.name: Nice, but didn't the original have moving stars?
